summary: A variety of public domain art for modder use.
descriptionHtml:
[u][color=#980000][size=5]Description[/size][/color][/u]
This is a modders resource and adds nothing to the normal game. It is intended for mod authors to add to their own mods.

This resource is built off the incredible work of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2811323]jet4571[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1330055]betterbecause[/url]. They made the frames and original textures. I just added the pretty pictures, which were sourced from the [url=https://images.nga.gov]National Gallery of Art[/url].

[u][color=#980000][size=5]Requirements[/size][/color][/u][b]
[/b]Skyrim
Creation Kit
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60246]HQ Frames and Canvas[/url]

[u][color=#980000][size=5]Details[/size][/color][/u][b]
[/b]File contains 21 pieces of public domain art in dds format.  2k diffuse saved in dxt1 format.
Texture filenames are written as such "in-game material-in-game frame size-title-artist-date".
Example .esp file contains example objects of each frame, and 21 texture sets for easy swapping between frames and art, as well as the example gallery cell seen in the screenshots.

[u][color=#980000][size=5]Installation[/size][/color][/u]
Make sure you download betterbecause's original resource and maintain his filepath and my own if you want to use my texture sets in the .esp.

[url=http://imgur.com/a/ezE6Y]Higher quality screenshots on imgur[/url]
author: morganmarz betterbecause jet4571
